metadata.title: CVE-2024-26839 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:IB/hfi1: Fix a memleak in init_credit_returnWhen dma_alloc_coherent fails to allocate dd->cr_base[i].va,init_credit_return should deallocate dd->cr_base anddd->cr_base[i] that allocated before. Or those resourceswould be never freed and a memleak is triggered.
